website_summaries.verdict: A versatile tire equally at home on all kinds of trucks, RVs, and trailers.
pros: The design focuses on high highway mileage and all-weather traction for safety in wet and dry conditions
The addition of polyester increases wear resistance and maximizes tread life while maintaining a quiet ride
Shoulder ribs protect the tire from curbs and other knocks
cons: Extended durability means they don’t give the optimum ride quality of models specific to RVs

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love These Tires!
customer_reviews.text: These are the last tires your 1970 Dodge Sweptline Pickup will ever need. Can't say enough. Bought 4, then after riding on them a year, bought one to replace the spare. Nicely made. Rides well. Hard rubber wears very slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Siddhis

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: A difficult size to find. These arrived quickly from across the country. Had no problems mounting, and only had to balance once.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find 16.5 tires. Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Tires are great about a year later and still like new. Great brand and deal Hate the size but I had no choice in this budget range.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C

customer_reviews.title: Firestone makes a good durable 950x16.5 tire and there a good value
customer_reviews.text: There fairly long lasting for my application and a good strong tire
customer_reviews.author: Robert Prewett

customer_reviews.title: Great tires! Especially given that 16
customer_reviews.text: Great tires! Especially given that 16.5 are a difficult size to find now. Responsive seller at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great tires. And we saved a mint by getting them from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: T Miller

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn't have a clear load description
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these tires not clearly described in the load index they take forever to ship despite Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 76 Silverado tires
customer_reviews.text: Nice tire hard to find anything comparable only negative they pick up gravel like crazy
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Tires last for years.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this exact brand of tire for decades. Very few tire manufacturers make this size: 9.5 x16.5 rim. Firestone Transforce is fabulous. The tires that are on my 1973 pickup are 8 years old when I purchased 2 new ones. Will never change to a lesser tire. Thank you , Firestone for my tires. The 2 new ones were manufactured in 2020, so these are recently constructed! Highly recommend this brand for older rims.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heck yeah it worked. I use these with 8.25 x 16.50" wheels.
customer_reviews.author: zzspiral

product_meta.title: Firestone Transforce HT Highway Terrain Commercial Light Truck Tire 9.50R16.5LT 121 R E
product_meta.description: The Firestone Transforce HT is a driving force for light truck and commercial vehicles. This tire's numerous features make for an all season, quiet and comfortable ride.
feature_bullets: Advanced High Modulus Tread Compound And Polyester And Steel Construction Helps To Prevent Damage And Promotes Long Wear.
Computer-Designed Shape And Body Contributes To Ride Comfort.
Circumferential Grooves Promotes Extra Traction In Wet Conditions.
Continuous Shoulder Ribs Helps Increase Tread Life.
Noise Reduction Technology Minimizes Noise Generation With Varying Size Tread Blocks.
Advanced High Modulus Tread Compound and Polyester and Steel Construction - Helps to prevent damage and promotes long wear
Computer-Designed Shape and Body - Contributes to ride comfort
Circumferential Grooves - Promotes extra traction in wet conditions
Continuous Shoulder Ribs - Helps increase tread life
